manage.noExeriencesSubtitle: You have not started any experiences yet. Find one to get started.
manage.qrCodeSubtitle: If you have a QR code for an experience, tap here. You can also download any featured experience from the list below.
manage.qrCodePointAt: Point your camera at a $t(glossary:appName) QR code
manage.downloadExplanation:
This will allow you to view this experience's media while offline.

It cannot guarantee that the map layer will be visible while offline.
manage.removeExplanation: Are you sure you want to remove this experience?

media.noMediaSubtitle: This place does not appear to have any associated media.
media.notResponsibleForLinks: We are not responsible for the content of links.

onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: With $t(glossary:appName) you can download and explore curated cultural heritage experiences.
onboarding.geolocationSubtitle: By enabling $t(glossary:appName) access to your location, you can view your location on the map, and we can alert you to nearby places.
onboarding.geolocationSubtitleIOS:
When prompted please choose
 "Allow while using" and then "Always allow".
onboarding.geolocationWontUseForAnythingElse: We won't use your location for anything else.
onboarding.pushNotificationsSubtitle: Enable push notifcations and we'll let you know when there's a nearby place when the app is closed.
